normalised: I've heard that I I T Kanpur is doing some interesting research on air pollution. Has anyone looked into their work? Also, is there anything *we*, as individuals, can actually do besides just complaining? Should I invest in an air purifier? Is wearing a mask while I ride my scooter to work at nine o'clock hours going to actually protect me, or am I just kidding myself? I mean, rupee five hundred for a decent mask adds up! Any tips from those who've successfully managed to mitigate the effects of pollution (especially from nearby construction which always seems to start at seven o'clock A M)? Let me know! I'm genuinely concerned for the future and the health of my kids. Thanks!
